sentences.en: Communicable diseases have been a curse of mankind since time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 自古以来,某些传染性疾病就是人类的灾祸.

sentences.en: False bottoms and bear market rallies have trapped investors since time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 投资者落入谷底假象和熊市止跌回升的陷阱久已有之.

sentences.en: From time immemorial the tribe have buried their dead here.
sentences.cn: 自古以来该部落就把死者埋葬在这里.

sentences.en: From time immemorial there has been the belief that there are good and bad places to be.
sentences.cn: 人生既有顺境，也有逆境，这种观念自古有之。

sentences.en: I see the Russian soldiers standing on the threshold of their native land, guarding the fields which their fathers have tilled from time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 我看见俄国士兵站在祖国的大门口，守卫着他们的祖先自远古以来劳作的土地。

sentences.en: Members of my family have lived in this house since time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 我的家人很久以前就住在这幢房子里了.

sentences.en: My family has lived in this village since time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 我家很早以前就一直住在这个村子里.

sentences.en: People have been kicking objects around for fun since time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 自古以来人们为了取乐就将身边的东西踢来踢去.

sentences.en: Since time immemorial, Hani women have participated in fish - raising.
sentences.cn: 自古以来, 哈尼族妇女就是梯田养鱼的参与者.

sentences.en: Since time immemorial, the whale has been wreathed in mystery—and of course it almost predates time itself, having existed long before the land around which it swims.
sentences.cn: 自远古以来，鲸鱼一直被披上神秘的色彩--当然它们也的确几乎与时间一样古老，它们存在的时间比它们游过的陆地的历史还长。

sentences.en: Such ceremonies have been handed down to us from time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 这种仪式不知从何时起一直传下来.

sentences.en: The Barton family have lived in this village since time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 巴顿家族自古以来就住在这个村里.

sentences.en: The museum has many immemorial cultural relics.
sentences.cn: 该博物馆收藏了很多极其古老的文物.

sentences.en: The story has come down from time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 这个故事从远古流传至今.

sentences.en: There have been ponies on Dartmoor from time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 自远古以来,达特穆尔高原就一直有小型马.

sentences.en: These legends have come down from time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 这些传说是从远古时代传下来的.

sentences.en: They have been in possession of the island for time immemorial.
sentences.cn: 他们自古以来就拥有该岛.

words.tran_cn: 远古的，古老的；无法追忆的

phrases.tran_cn: 远古以来；太古时代；很久以前；法律不能追溯的年代

trans.tran_en: starting longer ago than people can remember, or than written history shows
